title: 政府好關心市民私隱，睇《安心出行》就知

replies.msg:
係Google Play Store 搵唔到《安心出行》只搵到"LeaveHomeSafe"，對於政府咁唔愛國，覺得好唔開心。

不過政府好關心市民，睇下要求既permissions.

This app has access to:
📷Device & app history
retrieve running apps (睇下你行緊乜嘢app)
📷Photos/Media/Files
read the contents of your USB storage (睇下你電話有乜嘢檔案)
modify or delete the contents of your USB storage (幫你delete 不良檔案）
📷Storage
read the contents of your USB storage
modify or delete the contents of your USB storage
📷Camera
take pictures and videos （幫你影相，要影QR code 嘛）
📷Wi-Fi connection information
view Wi-Fi connections （唔止想要知你有無駁Internet, 重想知你駁住乜嘢Wifi）
Other
receive data from Internet
view network connections （當然想知你用緊345G 定Wifi 定有無用緊VPN)
allow Wi-Fi Multicast reception (政府重識得親切地發multicast packet, 智慧燈柱？）
full network access
run at startup （boot 機就啟動，驚你唔記得開）
control vibration
prevent device from sleeping
Google Play license check
Push

replies.msg:
Suzuki and Tsuchihashi, in 1970, devised a classification method of lip prints, which is as follows:

Type I - A clear-cut groove running vertically across the lip.
Type II - Partial-length groove of Type I.
Type III - A branched groove.
Type IV - An intersected groove.
Type V - A reticular pattern.
Type VI - Other patterns.

replies.msg:
好多app 都會要求讀寫storage. 但係是否有必要呢？如果整個相機app 或者係合理地需要呢樣嘢。但只係想搵個地方暫時儲temp file 就不必要storage permission.

就算佢有合理理由要求storage permission, 咁你是否相信佢會唔會私下做多過app 聲稱既用速呢？例如scan 一次你既相，讀哂exif 資料，就知你過去去過邊度。。。

quote.msg: 系味可以問吓私隱專員是否已過度收集私隱

replies.msg: 低度收集，建議再收集更多資料以提升用戶體驗
